meanings.sent1: The cactus was spinier than the smooth succulent plant.
meanings.sent2: The hedgehog's back was covered in spinier quills for protection.
meanings.sent3: The spinier sea urchin tried to give hugs but kept poking everyone.
meanings.sent4: His personality became spinier as he grew older, pushing people away.
meanings.sent5: The spinier thorns on the rose bush made it difficult to pick flowers.

meanings.sent1: The tornado was spinier than the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: The toy top was designed to be spinier than the other spinning toys.
meanings.sent3: The spinier carousel made everyone dizzy in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts became spinier as she tried to make a decision.
meanings.sent5: The spinier merry-go-round went faster than expected, causing excitement.

meanings.sent1: The porcupine was spinier than the hedgehog in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar was spinier than the smooth worm in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The spinier pine cone was mistaken for a spiky fruit by the squirrel.
meanings.sent4: His jokes became spinier as he tried to outwit his friends.
meanings.sent5: The spinier branches of the tree made it difficult to climb for the squirrel.
